gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.types

Class DtnConfidence

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpl.iondtn.types.DtnConfidence

  • public class DtnConfidence
extends java.lang.Object
    The DtnConfidence class represents a confidence as percentage, i.e. 0-100 percent. Although intialization can be done with more precise values, output values are always rounded to the next percent

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DtnConfidence(float value)
      Constructor that allows the instantiation with a float This constructor converts all values above 1.0 as 1.0 and all values below 0.0 as 0.0.
      DtnConfidence(int value)
      Constructor that allows the instantiation with an int This constructor converts all values above 100 as 100 and all values below 0 as 0.
      DtnConfidence(java.lang.String str)
      Constructor that allows the instantiation with a float string This constructor converts all values above 1.0 as 1.0 and all values below 0.0 as 0.0.
